entry.title: Green Creative's 6″ Click with PIR Sensor-3000K
entry.summary:
Vendor: Green Creative
Type: LED Lighting Fixtures
Price: 33.35

Green Creative's 6″ Click with PIR Sensor-3000K

 

SPECIFICATION FEATURES

  • Mechanical – Die cast aluminum heat sink. Polycarbonate lens and trim with
    integrated PIR sensor. Fixture surface mounts to industry standard 4” junction
    boxes from below the ceiling.
  • Electrical – 120V only, 50/60 Hz driver. Integrated PIR motion sensor turns
    ON with motion and OFF after 10 minutes of inactivity.
  • Optical – 2700K, 3000K, and 4000K color temperatures available.
    110° beam angle. Minimum 90CRI with 4-step SDCM. PIR sensor range 16’
    at 8’ mounting height.
  • Thermal – Die cast aluminum heat sink. Rated L70 lifetime of 50,000 hours.
    Ambient temperature rating: -4°F to 95°F (-25°C to 35°C).
  • Compliance and Warranty – ETL Listed for WET locations.
    Energy Star® listed. Air-tight rated JA8 Certified to meet CA Title 24
    requirements. Suitable for use within closet spaces when installed per NEC
    410.16 spacing requirements. 5 year parts warranty for complete fixture.

APPLICATIONS

  • Residential, Hospitality, and Commercial new construction and retrofit projects
  • Bathrooms, hallways
  • Closets, pantries, laundry rooms

BENEFITS

  • Fixture integrated PIR motion sensor automatically turns off fixture after 10 minutes of inactivity
  • Eliminates the need to external PIR sensor
  • Quick and easy installation
  • Wet location and Air-tight rated.

entry.title: LED Combo Exit Sign Red Letters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fulham
Type: Exit Signs and Combo Units
Price: 32.99

The Fulham FireHorse FHEC31-WR LED combination exit sign will have you prepared for any emergency. With an exclusive low-profile design, this exit sign allows for mountings above doors and restricted spaces. The FireHorse sports two 5.4-watt adjustable LED heads, giving you light where you need it the most. The exit sign utilizes a universal J-Box mounting system, allowing for mountings on the ceiling or the wall and has a switch-operated testing feature to ensure proper function. UL listed for damp locations, the unit has dual voltages of 120 and 277 volts, and provides 90 minutes of emergency operation during a power outage.

 

Brand: Fulham
MPN (Part No.): FHEC31WR
Family: FireHorse
Safety Rating: UL
Wattage: 3.2 Watt
Voltage: 120
Battery Type: Sealed Lead-Acid (SLA)
Chevrons: Universal Arrow Knockouts
Emergency Operation: 90 Minutes
Face Type: Single or Double
Finish: White
Lamp Head Wattage: 5.4 Watt
Lamp Heads: (2) Adjustable LED
Letter Color: Red
Letter Size: 6 in.
Light Source: LED
Mounting: Universal
Recharge Time: 24 Hours
Testing: Manual
Length: 21.8 in.
Warranty: 5 Years

entry.title: LED Edge-Lit Aluminum Housing Single Face Green Letters,BB
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fulham
Type: Exit Signs
Price: 95.00

Product Description

 

The green edge lit LED exit sign surface mount features a surface housing application that can be mounted universally. Its sleek acrylic panel is available either double or single sided with an aluminum surface mount housing. This unit is ideal for commercial offices, retail stores, and apartment buildings.

While providing an eye-catching design, the glowing acrylic panel is fully compliant and perfect for the interior. Its panel is a high-polish, injection-molded and is ultrasonically welded to eliminate visible hardware.
Standard measurements for width, height, and depth. green lettering have graduated depth of molded letter, which provides uniform distribution on graphics.

Requires no maintenance and includes 6V sealed lead-acid battery and can use dual voltage 120V/277V.

In addition to its attractive appeal, the green edge lit LED exit sign surface mount is UL 924 Listed and fully compliant throughout the United States. It's capable of being applied as a universal mount to either any ceiling (top) or wall (back). This model also has a 90-minute battery backup, which allows for visibility during any power outage. 

This singled and single sided unit features a mirror insert that gives the panel a clear optical illusion. It also operates singled 120 or 277V AC power, and is damp location rated. Includes field applied chevron directional indicators, LED charge indicator, comes in AC and EM models.

Features


• Attractive sleek look, acrylic panel, aluminum housing
• Push to test button
• UL 924 Listed
• Dual Voltage 120/277V
• Long Life Energy Saving LED Light Source
• Emergency Backup
• Maintenance Free, 6V Sealed Lead-Acid Battery
• Mirror Divider between panel
• 90 minute Emergency Operation
• LED charge indicator
• Field applied chevron directional indicators

Application


The green edge recessed lit LED exit sign is specifically designed for interior commercial building use. It is a preferred choice for its design and surface mounting capability. It requires 120VAC/277VAC lamp wattage for its LED lamp.

entry.title: Tritium Exit Sign Single Face Red/White 20 Year
entry.summary:
Vendor: SRB
Type: 20 Year Tritium Self luminous Exit
Price: 265.00

Spec Sheet

Tritium Self Luminous Exit Sign

Self-luminous exit signs are the most reliable exit signs offered today. They require no external energy source, no electrical wiring or batteries and are always ready to provide an effective, maintenance free exit marking system. Your first cost is your last cost!

Features

  • No electricity, no batteries
  • Explosion-proof
  • Weather-proof
  • Wet location listed
  • Universal top or side mounting bracket included
  • No maintenance
  • Easy installation, no wires
  • Letter-shaped light tubes give the best light in the industry
  • Concealed mounting
  • Suitable for floor proximity mounting

Dimensions

Height: 8.35”
Width: 0.93”
Length: 12.83”

 

Spec Sheet

Tritium Spec Sheet
